import React, { useEffect, useState, useRef } from "react"; import { Box, Container, Text, Tabs, TabList, TabPanels, Tab, TabPanel, } from "@chakra-ui/react"; import Login from "../Authentication/Login.js"; import Signup from "../Authentication/Signup.js"; import { useHistory } from "react-router-dom"; const LoginPage = () => { const history = useHistory(); useEffect(() => { const user = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem("userInfo")); if (user) history.push("/home"); }, [history]); return (
Tour and Travels Login Sign Up
); }; export default LoginPage;
